Translations.Text: Qul Yatawaffakum Malaku Al-Mawti Al-Ladhi Wukkila Bikum Thumma 'Ila Rabbikum Turja`una
Wa Law Tara 'Idhi Al-Mujrimuna Nakisu Ru'usihim `Inda Rabbihim Rabbana 'Absarna Wa Sami`na Farji`na Na`mal Salihaan 'Inna Muqinuna
Wa Law Shi'na La'atayna Kulla Nafsin Hudaha Wa Lakin Haqqa Al-Qawlu Minni La'amla'anna Jahannama Mina Al-Jinnati Wa An-Nasi 'Ajma`ina
Fadhuqu Bima Nasitum Liqa'a Yawmikum Hadha 'Inna Nasinakum Wa Dhuqu `Adhaba Al-Khuldi Bima Kuntum Ta`maluna
Innama Yu'uminu Bi'ayatina Al-Ladhina 'Idha Dhukkiru Biha Kharru Sujjadaan Wa Sabbahu Bihamdi Rabbihim Wa Hum La Yastakbiruna
Tatajafa Junubuhum `Ani Al-Maaji`i Yad`una Rabbahum Khawfaan Wa Tama`aan Wa Mimma Razaqnahum Yunfiquna
Fala Ta`lamu Nafsun Ma 'Ukhfiya Lahum Min Qurrati 'A`yunin Jaza'an Bima Kanu Ya`maluna
Afaman Kana Mu'uminaan Kaman Kana Fasiqaan La Yastawuna
Amma Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Falahum Jannatu Al-Ma'wa Nuzulaan Bima Kanu Ya`maluna
Wa 'Amma Al-Ladhina Fasaqu Fama'wahumu An-Naru Kullama 'Aradu 'An Yakhruju Minha 'U`idu Fiha Wa Qila Lahum Dhuqu `Adhaba An-Nari Al-Ladhi Kuntum Bihi Tukadhibuna
Wa Lanudhiqannahum Mina Al-`Adhabi Al-'Adna Duna Al-`Adhabi Al-'Akbari La`allahum Yarji`una
Wa Man 'Azlamu Mimman Dhukkira Bi'ayati Rabbihi Thumma 'A`raa `Anha 'Inna Mina Al-Mujrimina Muntaqimuna
Wa Laqad 'Atayna Musa Al-Kitaba Fala Takun Fi Miryatin Min Liqa'ihi Wa Ja`alnahu Hudaan Libani 'Isra'ila
Wa Ja`alna Minhum 'A'immatan Yahduna Bi'amrina Lamma Sabaru Wa Kanu Bi'ayatina Yuqinuna
Inna Rabbaka Huwa Yafsilu Baynahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fima Kanu Fihi Yakhtalifuna
Awalam Yahdi Lahum Kam 'Ahlakna Min Qablihim Mina Al-Quruni Yamshuna Fi Masakinihim 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin 'Afala Yasma`una
Awalam Yaraw 'Anna Nasuqu Al-Ma'a 'Ila Al-'Ari Al-Juruzi Fanukhriju Bihi Zar`aan Ta'kulu Minhu 'An`amuhum Wa 'Anfusuhum 'Afala Yubsiruna
Wa Yaquluna Mata Hadha Al-Fathu 'In Kuntum Sadiqina
Qul Yawma Al-Fathi La Yanfa`u Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'Imanuhum Wa La Hum Yunzaruna
Fa'a`ri `Anhum Wa Antazir 'Innahum Muntaziruna
